response:
Here's information about bin collections in our area:

🗑️ **General waste (black bin):** Collected every two weeks on Monday
♻️ **Recycling (blue bin):** Collected every two weeks on Thursday
🌿 **Garden waste (green bin):** Fortnightly Apr-Nov, monthly Dec-Mar

**Missed collection?** Report within 48 hours via our website or call 01234-123-4567.

**Tip:** You can check your exact collection days using your postcode on our website.
note: Sandbox demo - production version uses Amazon Bedrock AI
